question: Which Gothic-style church in Cēsis, Latvia, was consecrated in 1284?
asked_question_translated: Vilken kyrka i gotisk stil i Cēsis i Lettland invigdes år 1284?
answer: Sankt Johanneskyrkan i Cēsis, Lettland, invigdes år 1284 och är byggd i gotisk stil.
answer_translated_eng: The Church of St John in Cēsis, Latvia, was consecrated in 1284 and is built in Gothic style.
